TopicTitle: Mobile Processing Lab breaks right clicking

Articles.Content:
Precisely as the title says: I can right click perfectly fine in my modded game.

I've just started using the Mobile Lab--0.23.5--and if it appears on the launch pad, it completely breaks right click for all parts. If I don't use, nothing breaks.

The only thing I can think of that mods the Mobile Lab is Science Redefined, and there's no mention of this bug. Is this a known bug? Or is my Lab just...broken?
